Investigators walked away with computers , laptops , mobile telephones , routers , external hard drives , and USB memory sticks , not to mention cash , illegal firearms , and drugs .
One particular product , known as BlackShades RAT , let users secretly control a person 's computer remotely .
One particular product , known as BlackShades RAT , let users secretly control a person 's computer remotely .
Europol pointed to an 18 - year - old man who infected at least 2,000 computers , and took control of webcams to take photos of women and girls .
Europol pointed to an 18 - year - old man who infected at least 2,000 computers , and took control of webcams to take photos of women and girls .
BlackShades RAT , however , could also access and view documents , photographs and other files , and record keystrokes without the PC owner 's knowledge .
The computer could also be commandeered to carry out large - scale distributed denial - of - service ( DDoS ) cyber - attacks , as well as encrypt and deny access to files .

This case is yet another example of the critical need for coordinated law enforcement operations against the growing number of cyber criminals operating on an EU and global level , Troels Oerting , head of EC3 at Europol , said in a statement .

EC3 will continue - together with Eurojust and other partners - to work tirelessly to support our partners in the fight against fraudsters and other cyber criminals who take advantage of the Internet to commit crime .

The news comes as the Justice Department today announced that a Pennsylvania grand jury had indicted five Chinese military hackers for computer hacking , economic espionage , and more for targeting six Americans in the U.S. nuclear power , metals , and solar products industries .
